question: The Union government has banned which state-based insurgent group Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC)?
explanation: The Central government has recently banned Meghalaya-based insurgent group Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) for its increased activities of violence and other subversive acts. The government also declared HNLC and its factions, wings and front organisations as \"unlawful associations\" by exercising powers conferred by sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act of 1967.
